channel.title: Bike on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Bike on C'est la Z

item.title: Bikeshares - Bixi vs Citibike
item.description: We just got back from a few days in Montreal. Love the city - it’s walkable, lots of good food, love the waterfront, history, and lots to do. I also love seeing a city using a bike/walking combo. In a car, you speed by things too fast and parking’s always a problem. Foot alone doesn’t let you cover enough ground. By bike, you’re slow enough to see things but fast enough to get from place to place.
